desc: The metal tube through which a projectile or shot charge is fired
The stock of a firearm in the rear of the breech mechanism
It assist in visually aligning ranged weapons
A handle that assists users at vertical aiming
Barrel shroud specifically designed to allow the user to grip the front of the gun
It normally normally house the trigger, trigger group, and magazine
An ammunition storage and feeding device for a repeating firearm, either integral within the gun (internal/fixed magazine) or externally attached (detachable magazine).
It normally houses the barrel, breach, firing chamber, and bolt or bolt carrier grouping
